description:
A downsized version of SPY’s epic Marauder goggles, these SE (smaller edition) let those with smaller faces enjoy a top-tier goggle. A wide field of view and fog-defeating ventilation lets you keep your perfect line in sight. All styles include a bonus lens, so you’re ready for bluebird and grey bird days.

  • Fits small faces best
  • SPY Happy lenses heighten contrast and colour without effecting clarity
  • Cylindrical lenses provide crisp detail edge-to-edge
  • Anti-fog injected SIC™ (Superior Injected Curve) double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • Deadbolt™ lens change system uses the power of magnets for proper alignment and a simple locking lever to keep everything in place, making lens changes easy, even while wearing gloves
  • Flexible polyurethane frame conforms to any face for a comfortable fit
  • RISE™ ventilation system combats lens fogging by forcing air through the frame
  • Triple layer Isotron™ face foam is 3 different densities and features moisture wicking Dri-Force™ fleece
  • Silicone ribbed strap won't slip
  • Includes a spare low-light Happy persimmon lens with silver spectra and 46% visible light transmission
name: Spy+ Marauder SE Snow Goggles - Unisex
